abstract: Toyota’s top executives are trying to replicate the company’s success and operating principles in other countries while ceding more control to these new outposts.
snippet: Toyota’s top executives are trying to replicate the company’s success and operating principles in other countries while ceding more control to these new outposts.
lead_paragraph: TOYOTA CITY, Japan  At Toyota’s training center inside its Motomachi assembly complex here, workers use golf balls to limber up their fingers before they learn new tasks on the factory floor.

headline.main: At Toyota, a Global Giant Reaches for Agility
headline.print_headline: At Toyota, A Giant Strives To Show Its Agility
